resources.string: These aliases will be used if the main nickname is unavailable.
Simple IRC: A simple irc client based off of atomic
Simple IRC will authenticate you with these services after connect.
These channels will be automatically joined after connect.
You can only chat from within a channel or a query
You can\'t close the server window
These commands will be executed after connect.
Send a message to all channels
Send a file to a user
Remove operator status from a user
Remove voice status from a user
Give a user half operator status
Send a message to a channel or user
Send a notice to an other user
Open a private chat with a user
Send a raw line to the server
Show or change the current topic
Waiting for %1$s to accept the file transfer
AWESOME COOL DESCRIPTION LIKE HERE OR SOMETHING.

Simple IRC features a selection of color schemes. There are a wide selection of schemes, the majority based on the Base16 color schemes from Chris Kempson.

If you are coming from a previous release of Atomic, your color scheme will be reverted to the default.

A selection of the color schemes available

All color schemes have two variants: Dark and Light. AMOLED users may find it adventageous to use the dark style, as it will conserve power.

You can also use the Dark color scheme, to not blind you at night.

Simple IRC has two options for displaying the current channel. These are showing the channels as a bar (the default), which looks like this:

Optionally, you can turn off the channel bar and know only about the currently visible channel:

These settings may be found in the "Interface" section of the settings.

Many things have changed since the initial fork. This guide will show you some of the things that have changed between yaaic and Atomic.

Several large changes have happened that stand out from the rest.

A button has been added for nick completion. This is availible to all users, not just ones without physical search keys.

Nearly every icon and graphic has been revamped using the Holo style from Google.

Smileys and other features are still there, however. (This is not on by default)
Simple IRC features, like other clients, a status notification, showing the ways that you may be highlighted or contacted in a channel.

New in this version

Connections will automatically re-connect themselves when your mobile or wifi network breaks down.

Optionally, you may automatically reconnect your networks when you move between wifi and mobile networks

When you get kicked it will auto rejoin immediately (not enabled by default)

Welcome to Simple IRC, a fork of Atmoic. This guide will fill you in on what\'s changed or what\'s new.

Check out the project page at: https://github.com/jcjordyn130/simpleirc

I depend on you to provide me with feedback!
Could not log into the IRC server %1$s:%2$d

Simple IRC is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

Simple IRC makes use of the following libraries:

PircBot (a IRC API written in java)

MemorizingTrustManager (providing a non-naive SSL certificate manager)

ViewPagerIndicator (A wonderful library for the view page style indicator)
MOTD suppressed. To see it, use the ‘/motd’ command.
